solution_line_template: If Coraline has the number {coraline_number}, Jayden, whose number is {jayden_less_than_coraline} less than that of Coraline, has {coraline_number}-{jayden_less_than_coraline} = <<{coraline_number}-{jayden_less_than_coraline}={jayden_number}>>{jayden_number}
Together, Jayden and Coraline's numbers total {coraline_number}+{jayden_number} = <<{coraline_number}+{jayden_number}={jayden_coraline_total}>>{jayden_coraline_total}
Mickey's number is greater than Jayden's number by exactly {mickey_greater_than_jayden}, meaning his number is {jayden_number}+{mickey_greater_than_jayden} = {mickey_number}
The total of the numbers the three have is {jayden_coraline_total}+{mickey_number} = <<{jayden_coraline_total}+{mickey_number}={total_numbers}>>{total_numbers}
